Name: Crazy Boom
About the game: You are a taxi driver who sees the road and customers differently. He collects bonuses and throws them at dissatisfied customers, who, having received a certain amount of bonuses, leave and new ones come. An endless stream of passengers. Crazy Boom - A futuristic game about a paranormal vision of a taxi driver of the surrounding world, where he drives along the road, collects bonuses and fights against imaginary enemies. Features of the game: - Increasing complexity - Pixel Art - Pleasant music
